page.title: 01 ASH & WOODNESBOROUGH
page.content: Ash lies 3 miles west of Sandwich & 9 miles east of Canterbury, a flourishing village with plenty of shops and social activities,Dr.'s & vet's surgeries. The open landscape slopes gently to the south.Fruit,vegetables and orchards of all kinds & some cereals grow on the fertile land of farms & market gardens which meet marshland pastures to the NE Most of the area lies in the Parish of Wdnsboro a collection of small hamlets. There are many mediaeval houses in Ash and several manor houses in the area. Both parish churches are worth a visit. Employment in the area is mainly in agriculture which includes a mushroom farm and vineyard & winery.A factory in Ash assembles diesel generators and a claypit supplies Hammill brickworks. Hourly bus service until evening links Ash with Sandwich & Canterbury.Hospital Canterbury; Secondary schools Sandwich.
